unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Frenzy Grips Nation!**
normalised: Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Frenzy Grips Nation!

unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Get ready for a cinematic rollercoaster ride! Film festival season is officially here, and India is buzzing. From the Himalayan Film Festival showcasing indie gems to the Kolkata International Film Festival spotlighting global masterpieces, cinephiles are spoiled for choice.
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Get ready for a cinematic rollercoaster ride! Film festival season is officially here, and India is buzzing. From the Himalayan Film Festival showcasing indie gems to the Kolkata International Film Festival spotlighting global masterpieces, cinephiles are spoiled for choice.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that this year's screenings are even bigger and better, with promises of exclusive Q&A sessions with directors and actors. Spotted at the opening night of the Bangalore Short Film Festival was actress Deepika Padukone, looking absolutely stunning!
normalised: Word on the street is that this year's screenings are even bigger and better, with promises of exclusive Q and A sessions with directors and actors. Spotted at the opening night of the Bangalore Short Film Festival was actress Deepika Padukone, looking absolutely stunning!

unnormalised: And the best part? Post-screening chai and samosas, guaranteed! Forget fancy gourmet popcorn, we're talking authentic Indian flavours. Expect discussions to get heated – almost as spicy as a Hyderabadi biryani - as everyone debates their favourite films.
normalised: And the best part? Post-screening chai and samosas, guaranteed! Forget fancy gourmet popcorn, we're talking authentic Indian flavours. Expect discussions to get heated – almost as spicy as a Hyderabadi biryani - as everyone debates their favourite films.

unnormalised: Don’t forget the Thiruvananthapuram International Film Festival is coming up! Maybe this year it will showcase movies related to Onam and its celebrations? Keep your eyes peeled for award announcements and juicy gossip! Happy watching, folks!
normalised: Don’t forget the Thiruvananthapuram International Film Festival is coming up! Maybe this year it will showcase movies related to Onam and its celebrations? Keep your eyes peeled for award announcements and juicy gossip! Happy watching, folks!
